entry.title: Hexo Demo
entry.content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment Upload to algolia1234# if fail, do this$ hexo clean$ hexo algolia Alertinfo success warning danger no-icon Highlight Textyour highlighted text your highlighted text your highlighted text your highlighted text your highlighted text your highlighted text your highlighted text your highlighted text your highlighted text your highlighted text your highlighted text your highlighted text your highlighted text your highlighted text Block QuoteEvery interaction is both precious and an opportunity to delight. Seth GodinWelcome to Island Marketing _.compactUnderscore.js1234var a = 20;_.compact([0, 1, false, 2, '', 3]);=> [1, 2, 3] A beautiful disk 1alert('javascript') examplejscss1var test = 'test';123.btn { color: red;} JSexample.js1alert('JS'); A beautiful disk

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment Alertinfo success warning danger no-icon Highlight Textyour highlighted text your highlighted text your highlighted text your highlighted text your highlighted text your highlighted text your highlighted text your highlighted text your highlighted text your highlighted text your highlighted text your highlighted text your highlighted text your highlighted text Block QuoteEvery interaction is both precious and an opportunity to delight. Seth GodinWelcome to Island Marketing _.compactUnderscore.js1234var a = 20;_.compact([0, 1, false, 2, '', 3]);=> [1, 2, 3] A beautiful disk 1alert('javascript') examplejscss1var test = 'test';123.btn { color: red;} JSexample.js1alert('JS'); A beautiful disk
